item.description: A ground that is not horizontal.

field.name: slope.steepness
field.description: The distance on the Y-coordinate between the left edge and the right edge. Cannot be equal to zero.

field.name: slope.control_point.left.x
field.description: The X-coordinate of the left control point.

field.name: slope.control_point.left.y
field.description: The Y-coordinate of the left control point.

field.name: slope.control_point.right.x
field.description: The X-coordinate of the right control point.

field.name: slope.control_point.right.y
field.description: The Y-coordinate of the right control point.

field.name: slope.margin
field.description: An extra margin above the slope, where the collisions will also be detected.

field.name: slope.opposite_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the bottom side is active.

field.name: slope.left_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the left side is active.

field.name: slope.right_side_is_active
field.description: Tell if the right side is active.

field.name: slope.apply_angle
field.description: Tell if the angle of the slope is applied to the colliding items.
